thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 08 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Antofagasta suspends operations of Los Pelambres pipeline after blockage

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Antofagasta suspends operations of Los Pelambres pipeline after blockage
text:
May 8 (Reuters) - Antofagasta said on Tuesday it had uncovered and cleared a blockage in its Los Pelambres pipeline, which moves copper concentrates from Chileâ€™s Coquimbo region to ports, with some knock on effects for sales and production.
The company said it expected production, measured as the quantity filtered at the port, to be impacted by about 10,000 tonnes of copper due to the blockage and sales to be impacted by some 15,000 tonnes in the six months ending June 30.
It said its full-year guidance for production remained unchanged at 705,000 tonnes to 740,000 tonnes. (Reporting by Arathy S Nair in Bengaluru; editing by Patrick Graham)
